body_html:
@developer-mayuan @ispirmustafa
Thanks for your answer!
I still don't understand the loss of EstimatorSpec, does not it join in the back propagation process? What is the effect of loss of EstimatorSpec? only for summary? If so, can I summary multiple losses by feed it with an array?
I did not find any explanation in documentation, looking forward to your reply!

body:
@developer-mayuan @ispirmustafa 
Thanks for your answer!
I still don't understand the `loss` of `EstimatorSpec`, does not it join in the back propagation process? What is the effect of `loss` of `EstimatorSpec`? only for summary? If so, can I summary multiple losses by feed it with an array?
I did not find any explanation in documentation, looking forward to your reply!
